alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Cass; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 3:24AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cass, southwestern Guthrie and Audubon Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 324 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Atlantic, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Cass, southwestern Guthrie and Audubon Counties, including the following locations... Exira, Elk Horn, Kimballton, Brayton, Audubon County Airport, Atlantic Municipal Airport and Marne. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
